review: I recently visited Lesco Optical and was thoroughly impressed with the level of professionalism and expertise provided by the staff. The opticians were courteous, knowledgeable, and made the entire experience smooth and enjoyable. The store is accessible and has a friendly atmosphere, which made me feel welcome. The quality of the eyewear and the service exceeded my expectations, and I would highly recommend Lesco Optical to anyone looking for a reliable and professional optician.
